bibl.title: Hellenistic Royal Portraits.
bibl.note: Collects the major extant royal portraits on coins and in sculpture, and uses the documentary evidence to look at their context, meaning, and broad history.
bibl.seg: Oxford, Clarendon Press, 1988, 4Â°, xviii-196 pp., 1 carte et 80 pll.
Collects the major extant royal portraits on coins and in sculpture, and uses the documentary evidence to look at their context, meaning, and broad history.
